item.title: Why do puffins often have mutliple fish in their beaks at once?
item.description: Have you ever noticed that puffins often simultaneously carry multiple fish in their beaks at once? It’d be something like this: Source I thought this was interesting, and I had so many questions, including: Do they catch them all in one scoop? How come the fish are so organized? Do they hide their food while catching other fish? Why do other birds not steal them? Is this a ‘flex’?
